text: Will Wright (born on January 20, 1960 in Atlanta, Georgia) is an American video game developer and is the co-founder of Maxis, now a part of Electronic Arts. He's most famous for SimCity, The Sims and Spore. He is currently working on a new project, and has set up the "Stupid Fan Club". == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Atlanta Category:American video game designers
title: Will Wright (game developer)
